name: cas-miniprogram
author: 北京腾创互联软件技术有限公司

scripts.build:mp-weixin-dev: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-weixin --mode dev
scripts.build:mp-weixin-uat: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-weixin --mode uat
scripts.build:mp-weixin-prod: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-weixin --mode prod
scripts.dev:mp-weixin: npm run prepare && uni -p mp-weixin --mode loca
scripts.dev:mp-weixin-uat: npm run prepare && uni -p mp-weixin --mode loca-uat
scripts.dev:mp-weixin-prod: npm run prepare && uni -p mp-weixin --mode prod
scripts.build:app: npm run prepare && uni build -p app
scripts.build:app-android: npm run prepare && uni build -p app-android
scripts.build:app-ios: npm run prepare && uni build -p app-ios
scripts.build:mp-alipay: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-alipay
scripts.build:mp-baidu: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-baidu
scripts.build:mp-kuaishou: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-kuaishou
scripts.build:mp-lark: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-lark
scripts.build:mp-qq: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-qq
scripts.build:mp-toutiao: npm run prepare && uni build -p mp-toutiao
scripts.build:quickapp-webview: npm run prepare && uni build -p quickapp-webview
scripts.build:quickapp-webview-huawei: npm run prepare && uni build -p quickapp-webview-huawei
scripts.build:quickapp-webview-union: npm run prepare && uni build -p quickapp-webview-union
